name: The March Of The Blobs
description:
March of the blobs was done for compo Ludum Dare 43

Transform your blobs so that enough of your spawns reach the bath. The points needed for victory are also used for metamorphosis, use them wisely.

Game is played with the mouse, and counts 12 levels. If the webgame is a bit too slow on your machine, the windows build will probably be smoother if you can run it.

If the game is a bit  too hard, select first the transformation then pop the blob and you will have an easier time ;)

Have fun!

Ressources:

  • Press Start 2P font by Codeman38
  • OpenMpt for music
  • sfxr to generate sounds by DrPetter
  • made with GameMaker
